00043 // convenient local macros to record errors for debugging
00044 #define SAVE_ERR(_code_, _msg_) \
00045   do { \
00046     ScopedLock lock(m_mutex); \
00047     m_last_errors.push_back(HT_EXCEPTION(_code_, _msg_)); \
00048     while (m_last_errors.size() > MAX_ERROR_QUEUE_LENGTH) \
00049       m_last_errors.pop_front(); \
00050   } while (false)
00051 
00052 #define SAVE_ERR2(_code_, _ex_, _msg_) \
00053   do { \
00054     ScopedLock lock(m_mutex); \
00055     m_last_errors.push_back(HT_EXCEPTION2(_code_, _ex_, _msg_)); \
00056     while (m_last_errors.size() > MAX_ERROR_QUEUE_LENGTH) \
00057       m_last_errors.pop_front(); \
00058   } while (false)
00059 
00060 using namespace Hypertable;
00061 
00062 namespace {
00063   const uint32_t METADATA_READAHEAD_COUNT = 10;
00064   const uint32_t MAX_ERROR_QUEUE_LENGTH = 4;
00065 
00066   class MetaKeyBuilder {
00067   public:
00068     MetaKeyBuilder() : start(0), end(0) { return; }
00069     void
00070     build_keys(const char *format, uint32_t table_id, const char *row_key) {
00071       char *ptr;
00072       if (row_key) {
00073         start = new char [16 + strlen(row_key) + 1];
00074         sprintf(start, format, table_id);
00075         strcat(start, row_key);
00076       }
00077       else {
00078         start = new char [16];
00079         sprintf(start, format, table_id);
00080       }
00081       end = new char [16];
00082       sprintf(end, format, table_id);
00083       ptr = end + strlen(end);
00084       *ptr++ = (char)0xff;
00085       *ptr++ = (char)0xff;
00086       *ptr = 0;
00087     }
00088     ~MetaKeyBuilder() {
00089       delete [] start;
00090       delete [] end;
00091     }
00092     char *start;
00093     char *end;
00094   };
00095 }

00098 RangeLocator::RangeLocator(PropertiesPtr &cfg, ConnectionManagerPtr &conn_mgr,
00099     Hyperspace::SessionPtr &hyperspace, uint32_t timeout_ms)
00100   : m_conn_manager_ptr(conn_mgr), m_hyperspace_ptr(hyperspace),
00101     m_root_stale(true), m_range_server(conn_mgr->get_comm(), timeout_ms) {
00102 
00103   int cache_size = cfg->get_i64("Hypertable.LocationCache.MaxEntries");
00104 
00105   m_cache_ptr = new LocationCache(cache_size);
00106 
00107   initialize();
00108 }

00111 void RangeLocator::initialize() {
00112   DynamicBuffer valbuf(0);
00113   HandleCallbackPtr null_handle_callback;
00114   uint64_t handle;
00115 
00116   m_root_handler_ptr = new RootFileHandler(this);
00117 
00118   m_root_file_handle = m_hyperspace_ptr->open("/hypertable/root",
00119       OPEN_FLAG_READ, m_root_handler_ptr);
00120 
00121   handle = m_hyperspace_ptr->open("/hypertable/tables/METADATA",
00122       OPEN_FLAG_READ, null_handle_callback);
00123 
00124   m_hyperspace_ptr->attr_get(handle, "schema", valbuf);
00125 
00126   m_hyperspace_ptr->close(handle);
00127 
00128   SchemaPtr schema = Schema::new_instance((char *)valbuf.base, valbuf.fill(),
00129                                           true);
00130   if (!schema->is_valid()) {
00131     HT_ERRORF("Schema Parse Error for table METADATA : %s",
00132               schema->get_error_string());
00133     HT_THROW_(Error::RANGESERVER_SCHEMA_PARSE_ERROR);
00134   }
00135 
00136   m_metadata_schema_ptr = schema;
00137 
00138   m_metadata_table.name = "METADATA";
00139   m_metadata_table.id = 0;
00140   m_metadata_table.generation = schema->get_generation();
00141 
00142   Schema::ColumnFamily *cf;
00143 
00144   if ((cf = schema->get_column_family("StartRow")) == 0) {
00145     HT_ERROR("Unable to find column family 'StartRow' in METADATA schema");
00146     HT_THROW_(Error::BAD_SCHEMA);
00147   }
00148   m_startrow_cid = cf->id;
00149 
00150   if ((cf = schema->get_column_family("Location")) == 0) {
00151     HT_ERROR("Unable to find column family 'Location' in METADATA schema");
00152     HT_THROW_(Error::BAD_SCHEMA);
00153   }
00154   m_location_cid = cf->id;
00155 }

00158 RangeLocator::~RangeLocator() {
00159   m_hyperspace_ptr->close(m_root_file_handle);
00160 }

00162 
00163 void
00164 RangeLocator::find_loop(const TableIdentifier *table, const char *row_key,
00165     RangeLocationInfo *rane_loc_infop, Timer &timer, bool hard) {
00166   int error;
00167   uint32_t wait_time = 1000;
00168   uint32_t total_wait_time = 0;
00169 
00170   error = find(table, row_key, rane_loc_infop, timer, hard);
00171 
00172   if (error == Error::TABLE_NOT_FOUND) {
00173     ScopedLock lock(m_mutex);
00174     clear_error_history();
00175     HT_THROWF(error, "Table '%s' is (being) dropped", table->name);
00176   }
00177 
00178   while (error != Error::OK) {
00179 
00180     // check for timer expiration
00181     if (timer.remaining() < wait_time) {
00182       dump_error_history();
00183       HT_THROWF(Error::REQUEST_TIMEOUT, "Locating range for row='%s'", row_key);
00184     }
00185 
00186     // wait a bit
00187     poll(0, 0, (int)wait_time);
00188     total_wait_time += wait_time;
00189     wait_time = (wait_time * 3) / 2;
00190 
00191     // try again
00192     if ((error = find(table, row_key, rane_loc_infop, timer, true))
00193         == Error::TABLE_NOT_FOUND) {
00194       ScopedLock lock(m_mutex);
00195       clear_error_history();
00196       HT_THROWF(error, "Table '%s' is (being) dropped", table->name);
00197     }
00198   }
00199 
00200   clear_error_history();
00201 }

00203 
00204 int
00205 RangeLocator::find(const TableIdentifier *table, const char *row_key,
00206     RangeLocationInfo *rane_loc_infop, Timer &timer, bool hard) {
00207   RangeSpec range;
00208   ScanSpec meta_scan_spec;
00209   ScanBlock scan_block;
00210   int error;
00211   Key key;
00212   RangeLocationInfo range_loc_info;
00213   String start_row;
00214   String end_row;
00215   struct sockaddr_in addr;
00216   RowInterval ri;
00217   bool inclusive = (row_key == 0 || *row_key == 0) ? true : false;
00218 
00219   if (m_root_stale) {
00220     if ((error = read_root_location(timer)) != Error::OK)
00221       return error;
00222   }
00223 
00224   if (!hard && m_cache_ptr->lookup(table->id, row_key, rane_loc_infop))
00225     return Error::OK;
00226 
00230   if (table->id == 0 && (row_key == 0
00231       || strcmp(row_key, Key::END_ROOT_ROW) < 0)) {
00232     rane_loc_infop->start_row = "";
00233     rane_loc_infop->end_row = Key::END_ROOT_ROW;
00234     rane_loc_infop->location = m_root_range_info.location;
00235     return Error::OK;
00236   }
00237 
00240   range.start_row = 0;
00241   range.end_row = Key::END_ROOT_ROW;
00242   memcpy(&addr, &m_root_addr, sizeof(struct sockaddr_in));
00243 
00244   MetaKeyBuilder meta_keys;
00245   char *meta_key_ptr;
00246 
00247   if (table->id == 0)
00248     meta_keys.build_keys("%d:", 0, row_key);
00249   else
00250     meta_keys.build_keys("0:%d:", table->id, row_key);
00251 
00255   meta_key_ptr = meta_keys.start+2;
00256   if (hard ||
00257       !m_cache_ptr->lookup(0, meta_key_ptr, rane_loc_infop, inclusive)) {
00258 
00259     meta_scan_spec.row_limit = METADATA_READAHEAD_COUNT;
00260     meta_scan_spec.max_versions = 1;
00261     meta_scan_spec.columns.push_back("StartRow");
00262     meta_scan_spec.columns.push_back("Location");
00263 
00264     ri.start = meta_keys.start;
00265     ri.start_inclusive = true;
00266     ri.end = 0;
00267     ri.end_inclusive = false;
00268     meta_scan_spec.row_intervals.push_back(ri);
00269 
00270     meta_scan_spec.return_deletes = false;
00271     // meta_scan_spec.interval = ????;
00272 
00273     try {
00274       m_range_server.set_timeout(timer.remaining());
00275       m_range_server.create_scanner(addr, m_metadata_table, range,
00276                                     meta_scan_spec, scan_block);
00277     }
00278     catch (Exception &e) {
00279       if (e.code() == Error::RANGESERVER_RANGE_NOT_FOUND)
00280         m_cache_ptr->invalidate(0, meta_keys.start);
00281       SAVE_ERR2(e.code(), e, format("Problem creating scanner for start row "
00282                 "'%s' on METADATA[..??]", meta_keys.start));
00283       return e.code();
00284     }
00285 
00286     if ((error = process_metadata_scanblock(scan_block)) != Error::OK) {
00287       m_range_server.destroy_scanner(addr, scan_block.get_scanner_id(), 0);
00288       return error;
00289     }
00290 
00291     if (!scan_block.eos()) {
00292       m_range_server.destroy_scanner(addr, scan_block.get_scanner_id(), 0);
00293     }
00294 
00295     if (!m_cache_ptr->lookup(0, meta_key_ptr, rane_loc_infop, inclusive)) {
00296       String err_msg = format("Unable to find metadata for row '%s' row_key=%s",
00297                               meta_keys.start, row_key);
00298       HT_ERRORF("%s", err_msg.c_str());
00299       SAVE_ERR(Error::METADATA_NOT_FOUND, err_msg);
00300       return Error::METADATA_NOT_FOUND;
00301     }
00302   }
00303 
00304   if (table->id == 0)
00305     return Error::OK;
00306 
00311   range.start_row = rane_loc_infop->start_row.c_str();
00312   range.end_row   = rane_loc_infop->end_row.c_str();
00313 
00314   if (!LocationCache::location_to_addr(
00315       rane_loc_infop->location.c_str(), addr)) {
00316     String err_msg = format("Invalid location found in METADATA entry for row "
00317         "'%s' - %s", start_row.c_str(), rane_loc_infop->location.c_str());
00318     HT_ERRORF("%s", err_msg.c_str());
00319     SAVE_ERR(Error::INVALID_METADATA, err_msg);
00320     return Error::INVALID_METADATA;
00321   }
00322 
00323   meta_scan_spec.clear();
00324 
00325   meta_scan_spec.row_limit = METADATA_READAHEAD_COUNT;
00326   meta_scan_spec.max_versions = 1;
00327   meta_scan_spec.columns.push_back("StartRow");
00328   meta_scan_spec.columns.push_back("Location");
00329 
00330   ri.start = meta_keys.start+2;
00331   ri.start_inclusive = true;
00332   ri.end = meta_keys.end+2;;
00333   ri.end_inclusive = true;
00334   meta_scan_spec.row_intervals.push_back(ri);
00335 
00336   // meta_scan_spec.interval = ????;
00337 
00338   if (m_conn_manager_ptr &&
00339       !m_conn_manager_ptr->wait_for_connection(addr, timer.remaining())) {
00340     if (timer.expired())
00341       HT_THROW_(Error::REQUEST_TIMEOUT);
00342   }
00343 
00344   try {
00345     m_range_server.set_timeout(timer.remaining());
00346     m_range_server.create_scanner(addr, m_metadata_table, range,
00347                                   meta_scan_spec, scan_block);
00348   }
00349   catch (Exception &e) {
00350     if (e.code() == Error::RANGESERVER_RANGE_NOT_FOUND)
00351       m_cache_ptr->invalidate(0, meta_keys.start+2);
00352     SAVE_ERR2(e.code(), e, format("Problem creating scanner on second-level "
00353               "METADATA (start row = %s)", ri.start));
00354     return e.code();
00355   }
00356 
00357   if ((error = process_metadata_scanblock(scan_block)) != Error::OK) {
00358     m_range_server.destroy_scanner(addr, scan_block.get_scanner_id(), 0);
00359     return error;
00360   }
00361 
00362   if (!scan_block.eos()) {
00363     m_range_server.destroy_scanner(addr, scan_block.get_scanner_id(), 0);
00364   }
00365 
00366   if (row_key == 0)
00367     row_key = "";
00368 
00369   if (!m_cache_ptr->lookup(table->id, row_key, rane_loc_infop, inclusive)) {
00370     SAVE_ERR(Error::METADATA_NOT_FOUND, (String)"RangeLocator failed to find "
00371              "metadata for table '" + table->name + "' row '" + row_key + "'");
00372     return Error::METADATA_NOT_FOUND;
00373   }
00374 
00375   return Error::OK;
00376 }
00377 
00378 
00379 int RangeLocator::process_metadata_scanblock(ScanBlock &scan_block) {
00380   RangeLocationInfo range_loc_info;
00381   SerializedKey serkey;
00382   ByteString value;
00383   Key key;
00384   const char *stripped_key;
00385   uint32_t table_id = 0;
00386   struct sockaddr_in addr;
00387 
00388   range_loc_info.start_row = "";
00389   range_loc_info.end_row = "";
00390   range_loc_info.location = "";
00391 
00392   bool got_start_row = false;
00393   bool got_end_row = false;
00394   bool got_location = false;
00395 
00396   while (scan_block.next(serkey, value)) {
00397 
00398     if (!key.load(serkey)) {
00399       String err_msg = format("METADATA lookup for '%s' returned bad key",
00400                               serkey.str() + 1);
00401       HT_ERRORF("%s", err_msg.c_str());
00402       SAVE_ERR(Error::INVALID_METADATA, err_msg);
00403       return Error::INVALID_METADATA;
00404     }
00405 
00406     if ((stripped_key = strchr(key.row, ':')) == 0) {
00407       String err_msg = format("Bad row key found in METADATA - '%s'", key.row);
00408       HT_ERRORF("%s", err_msg.c_str());
00409       SAVE_ERR(Error::INVALID_METADATA, err_msg);
00410       return Error::INVALID_METADATA;
00411     }
00412     stripped_key++;
00413 
00414     if (got_end_row) {
00415       if (strcmp(stripped_key, range_loc_info.end_row.c_str())) {
00416         if (got_start_row && got_location) {
00417 
00421           if (!LocationCache::location_to_addr(
00422               range_loc_info.location.c_str(), addr)) {
00423             String err_msg = format("Invalid location found in METADATA entry "
00424                 "for row '%s' - %s", range_loc_info.end_row.c_str(),
00425                 range_loc_info.location.c_str());
00426             SAVE_ERR(Error::INVALID_METADATA, err_msg);
00427             HT_ERRORF("%s", err_msg.c_str());
00428             return Error::INVALID_METADATA;
00429           }
00430           if (m_conn_manager_ptr)
00431             m_conn_manager_ptr->add(addr, 300000, "RangeServer");
00432 
00433           m_cache_ptr->insert(table_id, range_loc_info);
00434           /*
00435           HT_DEBUG_OUT << "(1) cache insert table=" << table_id << " start="
00436               << range_loc_info.start_row << " end=" << range_loc_info.end_row
00437               << " loc=" << range_loc_info.location << HT_END;
00438           */
00439         }
00440         else {
00441           SAVE_ERR(Error::INVALID_METADATA, format("Incomplete METADATA record "
00442                    "found under row key '%s' (got_location=%s)", range_loc_info
00443                    .end_row.c_str(), got_location ? "true" : "false"));
00444         }
00445         range_loc_info.start_row = "";
00446         range_loc_info.end_row = "";
00447         range_loc_info.location = "";
00448         got_start_row = false;
00449         got_end_row = false;
00450         got_location = false;
00451       }
00452     }
00453     else {
00454       table_id = (uint32_t)strtol(key.row, 0, 10);
00455       range_loc_info.end_row = stripped_key;
00456       got_end_row = true;
00457     }
00458 
00459     if (key.column_family_code == m_startrow_cid) {
00460       const uint8_t *str;
00461       size_t len = value.decode_length(&str);
00462       //cout << "TS=" << key.timestamp << endl;
00463       range_loc_info.start_row = String((const char *)str, len);
00464       got_start_row = true;
00465     }
00466     else if (key.column_family_code == m_location_cid) {
00467       const uint8_t *str;
00468       size_t len = value.decode_length(&str);
00469       range_loc_info.location = String((const char *)str, len);
00470       if (range_loc_info.location == "!")
00471         return Error::TABLE_NOT_FOUND;
00472       got_location = true;
00473     }
00474     else {
00475       HT_ERRORF("METADATA lookup on row '%s' returned incorrect column (id=%d)",
00476                 serkey.row(), key.column_family_code);
00477     }
00478   }
00479 
00480   if (got_start_row && got_end_row && got_location) {
00481 
00485     if (!LocationCache::location_to_addr(
00486         range_loc_info.location.c_str(), addr)) {
00487       String err_msg = format("Invalid location found in METADATA entry for "
00488           "row '%s' - %s", range_loc_info.end_row.c_str(),
00489           range_loc_info.location.c_str());
00490       SAVE_ERR(Error::INVALID_METADATA, err_msg);
00491       HT_ERRORF("%s", err_msg.c_str());
00492       return Error::INVALID_METADATA;
00493     }
00494     if (m_conn_manager_ptr)
00495       m_conn_manager_ptr->add(addr, 300000, "RangeServer");
00496 
00497     m_cache_ptr->insert(table_id, range_loc_info);
00498 
00499     /*
00500     HT_DEBUG_OUT << "(2) cache insert table=" << table_id << " start="
00501         << range_loc_info.start_row << " end=" << range_loc_info.end_row
00502         << " loc=" << range_loc_info.location << HT_END;
00503     */
00504   }
00505   else if (got_end_row) {
00506     SAVE_ERR(Error::INVALID_METADATA, format("Incomplete METADATA record found "
00507              "under row key '%s' (got_location=%s)", range_loc_info
00508              .end_row.c_str(), got_location ? "true" : "false"));
00509   }
00510 
00511   return Error::OK;
00512 }
00513 
00514 
00515 int RangeLocator::read_root_location(Timer &timer) {
00516   DynamicBuffer value(0);
00517   String addr_str;
00518 
00519   m_hyperspace_ptr->attr_get(m_root_file_handle, "Location", value);
00520 
00521   m_root_range_info.start_row  = "";
00522   m_root_range_info.end_row    = Key::END_ROOT_ROW;
00523   m_root_range_info.location   = (const char *)value.base;
00524 
00525   m_cache_ptr->insert(0, m_root_range_info, true);
00526 
00527   if (!LocationCache::location_to_addr((const char *)value.base, m_root_addr)) {
00528     HT_ERROR("Bad format of 'Location' attribute of "
00529              "/hypertable/root Hyperspace file");
00530     SAVE_ERR(Error::BAD_ROOT_LOCATION, "Bad format of 'Location' attribute"
00531                   " of /hypertable/root Hyperspace file");
00532     return Error::BAD_ROOT_LOCATION;
00533   }
00534 
00535   if (m_conn_manager_ptr) {
00536 
00537     m_conn_manager_ptr->add(m_root_addr, 8000, "Root RangeServer");
00538 
00539     if (!m_conn_manager_ptr->wait_for_connection(m_root_addr,
00540                                                  timer.remaining())) {
00541       String addr_str;
00542       HT_ERRORF("Timeout (20s) waiting for root RangeServer connection - %s",
00543                 InetAddr::string_format(addr_str, m_root_addr));
00544     }
00545   }
00546 
00547   m_root_stale = false;
00548 
00549   return Error::OK;
00550 }
